name: ListRecurringExpenses
description:
Retrieve all recurring expenses from your records.

Use this tool to fetch a list of all recurring expenses. Ideal for situations where you need to review or manage periodic expenses systematically.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization whose recurring expenses need to be listed.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: recurring_expense_name_filter
parameters.description: Filter recurring expenses by name using either 'startswith' or 'contains'. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search recurring expenses by recurring expense name. Variants: recurrence_name_startswith and recurrence_name_contains. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: search_by_last_created_date
parameters.description: Filter recurring expenses based on last generated expense date. Use formats: last_created_date_start, last_created_date_end, last_created_date_before, last_created_date_after with date [yyyy-mm-dd].

value_schema.description: Search recurring expenses by date on when last expense was generated. Variants: last_created_date_start, last_created_date_end, last_created_date_before and last_created_date_after . Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

parameters.name: filter_by_next_expense_date
parameters.description: Filter recurring expenses by dates related to the next expected expense. Options include 'next_expense_date_start', 'next_expense_date_end', 'next_expense_date_before', and 'next_expense_date_after'. Format is 'yyyy-mm-dd'.

value_schema.description: Search recurring expenses by date on which next expense will be generated. Variants: next_expense_date_start, next_expense_date_end, next_expense_date_before and next_expense_date_after . Format [yyyy-mm-dd]

parameters.name: expense_status
parameters.description: Specify the status of expenses to search for. Allowed values are 'active', 'stopped', and 'expired'.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by expense status. Allowed Values active, stopped and expired

parameters.name: account_id_for_expense
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier for the expense account to filter expenses associated with it.

parameters.name: filter_by_account_name
parameters.description: Search expenses by account name with options for exact match or partial match using 'startswith' and 'contains'. Max-length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by expense account name. Variants account_name_startswith and account_name_contains . Max-length [100]

parameters.name: amount_filter
parameters.description: Specify a filter for expense amounts, such as 'amount_less_than', 'amount_less_equals', 'amount_greater_than', or 'amount_greater_than'.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by amount. Variants: amount_less_than, amount_less_equals, amount_greater_than and amount_greater_than

parameters.name: search_by_customer_name
parameters.description: Search recurring expenses by customer name. Use variants 'customer_name_startswith' or 'customer_name_contains'. Max 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by customer name. Variants: customer_name_startswith and customer_name_contains . Max-length [100]

parameters.name: search_by_customer_id
parameters.description: Specify the customer ID to search expenses associated with that customer.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by customer id.

parameters.name: paid_through_account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account through which the expense was paid. Used to filter expenses.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by paid through account id.

parameters.name: expense_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter recurring expenses by their status. Use 'Status.All', 'Status.Active', 'Status.Expired', or 'Status.Stopped'.

value_schema.description: Filter expenses by expense status. Allowed Values Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Expired and Status.Stopped

parameters.name: search_expenses_by_text
parameters.description: Specify text to search expenses by account name, description, customer name, or vendor name. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search expenses by account name or description or customer name or vendor name. Max-length [100] .

parameters.name: sort_expenses_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort expenses by. Allowed values: next_expense_date, account_name, total, last_created_date, recurrence_name, customer_name, created_time.

value_schema.description: Sort expenses.Allowed Values next_expense_date, account_name, total, last_created_date, recurrence_name, customer_name and created_time

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: The page number of records to retrieve, starting from 1. Default is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Specify how many records to retrieve per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
